trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_SEQ_00<tab>Thancred wishes to have a word with the hero of the hour.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Alisaie in the Crystarium.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the manager of suites in the Pendants.

TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>It was pure luck that we managed to hold the Eulmorans at bay long enough for you to succeed─but we have earned some good fortune. And while it is plain we've not seen the last of General Ran'jit, I for one am glad to delay our reckoning with him awhile longer.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>It seems I was wrong about your friend. Had Feo Ul not stepped in, you'd be frolicking with the faeries by now.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_RYNE_000_010<tab>I'm going to train harder. Having seen what you've achieved, it's the least I can do.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_URIANGER_000_015<tab>Though the battle is over, the war is far from won. Let us fix our gaze upon the road ahead.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_THANCRED_000_020<tab>I knew you could do it. And not only because of your blessing. You have a strength all your own, and it has seen us through many a trial.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_THANCRED_000_021<tab>With the Warden defeated, I believe our work here is done. It is time we were going─<var 1A 02 /var>together<var 1A 01 /var>, needless to say.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_THANCRED_000_022<tab>...To the bitter end─the fate of our two worlds being at stake, and all that.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_THANCRED_000_023<tab>Now then, I suggest we hurry back to the Crystarium. Much and more may have happened while we were frolicking with the fae folk.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_THANCRED_000_024<tab>That Ran'jit elected to pursue us makes me hopeful the city was spared Eulmore's attentions, but I would sooner see for myself.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_THANCRED_000_025<tab>Besides, I believe I speak for us all when I say that I've had a bellyful of Il Mheg. Let us away before the faeries think to play with us again.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>I see nothing out of the ordinary.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_THANCRED_000_035<tab>Though we've spent most of our time on the road, Minfilia and I actually have apartments here. Perhaps now we may finally make use of them.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_RYNE_000_040<tab>All seems well, thank goodness...
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_URIANGER_000_045<tab>The city appeareth unchanged from when last I visited. There is the selfsame comforting hum of activity in the air.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_MYSTERYVOICE_000_047<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? I...I was not expecting you so soon.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_MYSTERYVOICE_000_048<tab>Glad though I am to see you, I daresay you are missed by your comrades. Mayhap you should rejoin them first.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_ALPHINAUD_000_050<tab>Finding common ground with an Ascian... My entire being rebels at the very notion.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_THANCRED_000_055<tab>He appears to be gone, but I won't be lowering my guard just yet.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_RYNE_000_060<tab>So that was an Ascian... Thancred told me about them.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_URIANGER_000_065<tab>That an Ascian of Emet-Selch's standing should willingly reveal himself unto us─and at this of all junctures─is...most interesting.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_ALISAIE_000_070<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Cooperation<var 1A 01 /var>? He can't be serious...can he?
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_ALISAIE_000_071<tab>Well, we've certainly been given much to ponder, but first things first: we should report to the Exarch.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_ALISAIE_000_072<tab>You can run along, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We're perfectly capable of handling this little task.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_ALISAIE_000_073<tab>In light of your recent exertions, I'd say you've earned a rest.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_ALISAIE_000_074<tab>Go on, take yourself off to bed. We'll see you later, refreshed and ready for more.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_MYSTERYVOICE_000_075<tab>That your safe and triumphant return should be spoiled by an uninvited guest...
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_MYSTERYVOICE_000_076<tab>But let us not dwell on it here and now. I will have the details of your mission from the others. You, meanwhile, should get some rest.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS_000_080<tab>Ah, welcome back, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. We've been expecting you.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS_000_081<tab>You will find refreshments laid out in your quarters. We hope they are to your liking.
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS_000_082<tab>Will you be retiring now?
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_Q1_000_000<tab>Retire to your quarters?
TEXT_LUCKMB120_03321_GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS_000_083<tab>Very good, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. I bid you a pleasant evening.
